def get_bills_for_customer(customer_id: str, limit: int = 12) -> List[tau2.domains.telecom.data_model.Bill]:
    """
Retrieves a list of the customer's bills, most recent first.

Args:
    customer_id: ID of the customer.
    limit: Maximum number of bills to return.

Returns:
    List of Bill objects, ordered by issue date (newest first).

Raises:
    ValueError: If the customer is not found.
"""

limit.description: Maximum number of bills to return.
limit.title: Limit

customer_id.description: ID of the customer this bill belongs to
customer_id.title: Customer Id

period_start.description: Start date of the billing period (format: YYYY-MM-DD, timezone: EST)
period_start.title: Period Start

period_end.description: End date of the billing period (format: YYYY-MM-DD, timezone: EST)
period_end.title: Period End

issue_date.description: Date the bill was issued/generated (format: YYYY-MM-DD, timezone: EST)
issue_date.title: Issue Date

due_date.description: Date by which payment is due (format: YYYY-MM-DD, timezone: EST)
due_date.title: Due Date

line_items.description: Individual charges, credits, and payments on this bill
line_items.title: Line Items

description.description: Descriptive text for the line item
description.title: Description

amount.description: Monetary amount in USD (positive for charges, negative for credits)
amount.title: Amount

date.description: Date the line item was applied (format: YYYY-MM-DD, timezone: EST)
date.title: Date

item_type.description: Category of the line item (e.g., Plan Charge, Overage, Fee, Credit, Payment)
item_type.title: Item Type

returns.description: List of Bill objects, ordered by issue date (newest first).
returns.title: Returns
